texts.definition: Resources that at least one players is unaware of concerning existence or specific details.
markups: <style="Definition">Resources that at least one players is unaware of concerning existence or specific details.</style>

In many cases, players do not have complete information regarding resources that exist in games. These resources are <style="CurrentLink">Secret Resources</style> in one sense or another due to this until all players have been provided the information.

The identities of one's pieces in <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Stratego">Stratego</link></style> are a form of <style="CurrentLink">Secret Resource</style> in that game, as it the positions of one's ships in <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Battleship">Battleship</link></style>.

Many <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Category:Computer-based%20Roleplaying%20Games">Computer-based Roleplaying Games</link></style> and <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Category:FPS%20Games">FPS Games</link></style> contain secret areas with <style="CurrentLink">Secret Resources</style>. Examples of such games include the <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Fallout%20series">Fallout series</link></style>, the <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Elder%20Scrolls%20series">Elder Scrolls series</link></style>, the <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Doom%20series">Doom series</link></style>, and the <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Half-Life%20series">Half-Life series</link></style>.

Until others have performed sufficient scouting activities, the specifics of one's base in the <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Warcraft%20series">Warcraft series</link></style> and <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Starcraft%20series">Starcraft series</link></style> are <style="CurrentLink">Secret Resources</style>. When playing on new maps in these games, the location of most <style="Link"><link="resources">Resources</link></style> in the game worlds are also <style="CurrentLink">Secret Resources</style>.

<style="CurrentLink">Secret Resources</style> are constructed by introducing <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Imperfect%20Information">Imperfect Information</link></style> or <style="Link"><link="uncertainty-information">Uncertainty of Information</link></style> regarding <style="Link"><link="resources">Resources</link></style>. This may be through their placement and diegetic knowledge about them in <style="Link"><link="game-worlds">Game Worlds</link></style> or about abstract <style="Link"><link="resources">Resources</link></style>. Providing <style="Link"><link="fog-war">Fog of War</link></style> that covers <style="Link"><link="resources">Resources</link></style> is one way of doing the former while having <style="Link"><link="hands">Hands</link></style> of <style="Link"><link="cards">Cards</link></style> is one way of doing the latter. Enabling players to having knowledge about <style="CurrentLink">Secret Resources</style> is one way to provide <style="Link"><link="privileged-abilities">Privileged Abilities</link></style> in games.
<style="CurrentLink">Secret Resources</style> can be used to provide additional benefits to performing <style="Link"><link="reconnaissance">Reconnaissance</link></style> goals.

<style="CurrentLink">Secret Resources</style> make players have <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Limited%20Planning%20Ability">Limited Planning Ability</link></style> and give them <style="Link"><link="gain-information">Gain Information</link></style> and <style="Link"><link="game-world-exploration">Game World Exploration</link></style> goals as long as they are at least aware of that they might exist. They may constitute <style="Link"><link="easter-eggs">Easter Eggs</link></style> in <style="Link"><link="game-worlds">Game Worlds</link></style>, although not distinct ones unless the <style="Link"><link="resources">Resources</link></style> they constitute are very rare or unique. <style="CurrentLink">Secret Resources</style> can create <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Asymmetric%20Information">Asymmetric Information</link></style> as long as some players have knowledge about them but others do not.

<style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Asymmetric%20Information">Asymmetric Information</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="easter-eggs">Easter Eggs</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="gain-information">Gain Information</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="game-world-exploration">Game World Exploration</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Limited%20Planning%20Ability">Limited Planning Ability</link></style>
